description: Connection reset by peer - existing connection forcibly closed by remote host. Socket-level communication failure.
solutions: Implement automatic retry with exponential backoff
examples: try { response = client.execute(request) } catch (e: IOException) { if (e.message?.contains("Connection reset") == true) retry() }

suspend fun <T> retryOnReset(times: Int = 3, block: suspend () -> T): T { repeat(times - 1) { try { return block() } catch (e: IOException) { if ("reset" in e.message.orEmpty()) delay(1000) else throw e } }; return block() }
